results.content: This is a good course on how to design and develop a WordPress site. The instructor begins with beginner fundamentals and guides through advanced customization. This course is ideal for both beginners to web design as well as those familiar with HTML and CSS who want to learn about WordPress.
results.content_html: This is a good course on how to design and develop a WordPress site. The instructor begins with beginner fundamentals and guides through advanced customization.
